Company: Toshiba, Toshiba America Information Systems, Inc. (TAIS)
Description of incident: Eleven admin email addresses with corresponding plain-text passwords and ID numbers were posted online.  A total of 451 email addresses and plain-text passwords were posted.  The hacking group VOID claimed responsibility.UPDATE (7/18/2011): Toshiba confirmed that records of 7,520 customers were hacked. Customers may have had their email addresses, passwords and phone numbers taken.  It was confirmed that 681 customers had their email addresses and passwords taken.
